titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-07-19T13:54-0400

change.item: Edited by Bonnie Gordon to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: Collection of documents and photographs related to Anna Magid, a member and tenant of the Workers Colony Corporation in the Bronx.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Anna Magid was a member and tenant of the United Workers Colony Corporation in the Bronx.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This small collection of documents includes tenant's stock certificate and a Yiddish middle school graduation book.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain beginning in 2050. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Collection was likely donated by Marcia Bernstien. The accession number associated with this gift is 2008.059.

controlaccess.subject: Housing, Cooperative |z New York (State) |z New York.
